title: What is special about the orientation of SIMS? - Quora

response.answer_text: SIMS orientation is something you go through from day one of your course. This is an integral part of the curriculum in order to orient the student to be transformational leaders. You are engrained with alot of skills and can see snapshot of your future journey. The following are some major learnings from the program- Team work - the group work allocation increases the strength and bond between the team mates.Quick decision making- You are adapted to take a quick decision for any important event in your life.Tweak to your personality - Somehow at the end of the program, you can observe a positive change in yourself. Not only your are more knowledgeable but are ready to undertake any difficulty.Time management- You get to learn how to utilise the allocated 24 hrs to you in a day. The best and effective use of your time. The activities are specially designed to incorporate time management.

SIMS orientation is one of the best experience a student can have. With the begining of your B - School journey, you get to learn a lot of things in the orientation. It's quite tough but you manage to make your path smooth. SIMS orientation is special because it teaches a lot of things from managing your time, making new networks, coordinating, to team work. It helps in making you physically plus mentally strong. A typical day in orientation starts with the PT/Exercise in the morning, having guest sessions and different activities throughout the day, doing assignments and submitting by the night. Orientation forces you to come out of your comfort zone and pushes you to make an effort.
